content: <articles>    <article xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink/">   <front>     <article-meta>       <title-group>         <article-title>Results of the Digital Curation Centre 2014 RDM Survey Pre-\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdrelease Briefing 2,</article-title>       </title-group>       <contrib-group>         <contrib contrib-type="author">           <name>             <surname>Whyte</surname>             <given-names>Angus</given-names>           </name>           <aff>             <institution>Digital Curation Centre, University of Edinburgh</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>       </contrib-group>       <pub-date pub-type="pub">         <year>2014</year>       </pub-date>       <self-uri xlink:href="http://zenodo.org/record/10712"/>       <self-uri xlink:href="http://zenodo.org/record/10712/files/DCC_RDM2014_SurveyAnalysis_Pre2.pdf"/>       <self-uri xlink:href="http://zenodo.org/record/10712/files/DCC_RDM2014_SurveyAnalysis_Pre2.png?subformat=icon-90"/>     </article-meta>     <abstract><p>The 2nd of 3 Briefing papers giving results of the DCC survey, originally released to survey respondents on 1st May 2014. The report outlines:</p>  <p>How far have institutions progressed towards developing RDM policy?</p>  <p>How far have institutions got in implementing their policies?</p>  <p>When will institutions be able to provide for long-term access?</p>  <p>What external guidance and support is needed now?</p>  <p>What shared services are appropriate?</p></abstract>   </front>   <article-type>user-dcc-rdm-2014</article-type> </article>   </articles>
